# What is your Mobile Bot Defense project?

Learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile bot detection in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, release, and monitor lifecycle of Android & iOS anti-bot defense in mobile apps fast. Detect Android & iOS bots, credential stuffing attacks, fake apps, card cracking, account takeovers (ATOs), Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) and invalid traffic (IVT) and more. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/)

Subcategories

[### API & Bot Defense >

Learn to protect mobile app APIs and backend endpoints from automated bot attacks in Android & iOS apps using Appdome’s MobileBOT™ Defense. Appdome’s no-code platform secures high-value resources like login, registration, checkout, and authentication APIs from scripted traffic, fake sessions, and credential abuse. Deliver Certified Secure™ protection via CI/CD—fast. Stop automated abuse across all Android & iOS apps including Kotlin, Swift, React Native, Flutter, and more. Ensure only legitimate users can reach protected services.

[### Session Risk & Validation >

Learn to validate mobile sessions and enforce risk-based protections in Android & iOS apps using Appdome’s Session Risk feature in MobileBOT™ Defense. Classify sessions as Safe or At-Risk using on-device detections and telemetry, and use embedded headers to extend zero trust across APIs, WAFs, and backend services. Deliver Certified Secure™ validation for every session in CI/CD and enforce your security logic at scale.

[### Anti-Bot Connection Hardening >

Learn to harden anti-bot configurations and runtime logic in Android & iOS apps using Appdome’s MobileBOT™ Defense. Prevent attackers from reading, modifying, or bypassing bot defenses by securing logic, config files, detection flows, and telemetry at rest and during runtime. Appdome’s no-code solution delivers Certified Secure™ protection instantly in CI/CD. Guard against reverse engineering, tampering, and replay techniques across all mobile apps—no SDKs, servers, or code changes required.

[### Mobile Device & Connection Risk >

Learn to determine device and connection trust in Android & iOS apps using Appdome’s MobileBOT™ Defense. Leverage 400+ on-device detections across 5 threat categories—Security, Anti-Malware, Anti-Fraud, Anti-ATO, and Geo Compliance—to evaluate the trustworthiness of each session in real time. Appdome provides Certified Secure™ protection in CI/CD with no SDKs or code. Enforce adaptive risk policies, reduce fraud, and protect every user session from compromised environments and adversarial automation.
